website_summaries.verdict: Discerning diners who are reluctant to wear traditional bibs might find this inconspicuous option more appealing. Stylish and effective.
pros: Looks like a regular shirt at a glance
Generous size keeps shirts and laps clean
Bottom can be buttoned to form a pocket crumb catcher or left open for extra coverage
Ideal for special occasions or everyday use
cons: Neck opening is somewhat small and might not suit wider necks
